intro.introduce: I'm committed to building scalable, maintainable web applications using modern technologies. I love solving complex problems and turning them into elegant solutions.

whatIDo.title: What I Do?
whatIDo.subtitle: Discover what I can do for your project

qa1.question: What technologies do you use?
qa1.answer: I work with modern technologies including React, TypeScript, Node.js, Next.js, NestJS, TailwindCSS, and many more. I'm always learning and adapting to new tools.

qa2.question: Do you do fullstack development?
qa2.answer: Yes! I handle both frontend and backend tasks. From building responsive UIs to designing scalable APIs and databases, I cover the full development lifecycle.

qa3.question: Do you love coding?
qa3.answer: Absolutely! Coding is not just work for me, it's a passion. I enjoy solving complex problems and creating elegant solutions that make a difference.
